name: Brutal Doom: Arthur's Edition Reloaded
summary: This mod is in it essence the excellent DOX PERSONALIZED ADDON / BRUTAL DOOM PLATINUM and a bunch of other mods compiled. I included others dox’s weapons, modified it to be more balanced for this mod, updated MUTATORS (XV117) which adds items to the game, added new enemies, weapons, armors, voxels, changed a lot of sprites, made a carry weight system (optional), made a realistic reloading system (optional). As it became more extensive than I could have initially imagined, I had to make it available here! Hope you enjoy!
